text: wdrb allah mathalana balda "mk" kanat fi 'aman min alaetda', watmynan min dayq aleysh, yatiha rizquha hnyyana sahlaan min kuli jht, fjhd ahluha nieam allah elyhm, washrku bh, walam yshkru lh, feaqbhm allah baljwe, walkhawf min saraya rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam wjywshh, alty kanat tkhyfhm; wdhlk bsbb kufruhum wsnyehm albatl
